summary_detail.value: The Northern Rockies Type 2 Incident Management Team is hosting a public meeting on the Meyers Fire. A meeting will be held on Friday, September 1 at 6:00 pm at the Sula Community Club House on East Fork Road in Sula for the Meyers Fire.

title: Meyers Fire Community Meetings (Meyers Fire Wildfire)
